name: Cats & Coffee - test
description:
I'm sorry! the game is played with the arrow keys but I don't know what happened and just moves with the mouse, I hope it can still be playable

It is only a Môsi test, it is a good program to do this kind of thing, but I would like it to have other options that Bitsy has, just like Môsi has options that Bitsy no, even so, I found it enough useful uwu

Thanks for playing! I would be grateful if you could give me advice to keep improving on this

 nwn <3
